body:
Use master
Alter Database LEOTEXTILE_TEST Set Single_User With Rollback Immediate
Restore Database LEOTEXTILE_TEST
From Disk = N'Z:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL14.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\Backup\20230704_LEOTEXTILE.bak'
With File = 1, Move N'LEOTEXTILE_Data'
               To N'F:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL14.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\Data\LEOTEXTILE_TEST_Data.MDF',
     Move N'LEOTEXTILE_Log'
     To N'L:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL14.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\Data\LEOTEXTILE_TEST_Log.LDF',
     Move N'LEOTEXTILE_File'
     To N'F:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL14.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\Data\LEOTEXTILE_TEST_File', NoUnload, Replace, Stats = 5,
     FileStream (Directory_Name = 'FILEDATATEST');
Alter Database LEOTEXTILE_TEST Set Multi_User
--deneme
Go
